bookTitle: Framed! Crime-Fighting Collection: Framed!; Vanished!; Trapped!
Plot: James Ponti takes readers on three heart-stopping mysteries rich with adventure, unforgettable characters, and old-fashioned sleuthing in the Edgar Award–winning Framed! series—now available in a collectible boxed set! Middle school is hard. Solving cases for the FBI is even harder. Doing both at the same time—well that’s just crazy. But that doesn’t stop Florian Bates! Get to know the only kid on the FBI Director’s speed dial—and several international criminals’ most wanted lists—in this adventurous series that School Library Journal says combines “elements of Alex Rider, James Bond, and Sherlock Holmes.” This collection includes paperback editions of: Framed! Vanished! Trapped!
